author: Hero Hei
description:
Voice Actors on Bluesky are currently bashing the VA for Beidou in Genshin Impact over statements that she had previously made that were critical of the SAG-AFTRA union and the VA industry. Let's take a look.

title: Genshin Impact voice actor is under fire by other VAs
